titles.title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to its Parliamentarian, the Honorable Charles W. Johnson, III.
Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to its Parliamentarian, the Honorable Charles W. Johnson, III.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 651.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the gratitude of the House of Representatives to the Honorable Charles W. Johnson, III for his unrivaled record of devoted service and steady, impartial guidance as its Parliamentarian.
